title: Lynda - Design the Web: Creating CSS-Only Navigation Menus
description:
Lynda - Design the Web: Creating CSS-Only Navigation Menus

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

29m 44s Beginner Sep 15, 2015   | Uploaded in Dec 22, 2015 By 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Software: HTML CSS 
Author: Chris Converse 

Did you know you can add dropdown menus to your webpage with nothing more than HTML and CSS? Typically interactive menus are accomplished with jQuery or another JavaScript framework. But the truth is, with CSS you can create the same rich experience, including full support for iOS and touch-screen Windows devices. In this installment of Design the Web, Chris Converse teaches us how to nest lists, style and position menus, add in ARIA markup for cross-compatibility, and make the menus fully responsive.â€¨â€¨The exercise files are free to all members! Download them today to start creating your own multilevel dropdown menus.
